properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 2:34PM CST until January 18 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind
chills as low as 25 below to 35 below zero. For the Winter
Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. Winds could gust as
high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Portions of northeast South Dakota.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Thursday.
For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday afternoon through
Saturday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute Friday
and Saturday. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The
dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed
skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the
latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON
